00025 $menu[] = array('Header', __('Stock Take'));
00026 $menu[] = array(__('Stock Take History'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/index.php', __('View Stock Take History'));
00027 // check if there is any active stock take proccess
00028 $stk_query = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM stock_take WHERE is_active=1');
00029 if ($stk_query->num_rows) {
00030     $menu[] = array(__('Current Stock Take'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/current.php', __('View Current Stock Take Process'));
00031     $menu[] = array(__('Stock Take Report'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/st_report.php', __('View Current Stock Take Report'));
00032     $menu[] = array(__('Finish Stock Take'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/finish.php', __('Finish Current Stock Take Proccess'));
00033     $menu[] = array(__('Current Lost Item'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/lost_item_list.php', __('View Lost Item in Current Stock Take Proccess'));
00034     $menu[] = array(__('Stock Take Log'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/st_log.php', __('View Log of Current Stock Take Proccess'));
00035     $menu[] = array(__('Resynchronize'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/resync.php', __('Resynchronize bibliographic data with current stock take'));
00036     $menu[] = array(__('Upload List'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/st_upload.php', __('Upload List in text file'));
00037 } else {
00038     $menu[] = array(__('Initialize'), MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/init.php', __('Initialize New Stock Take Proccess'));
00039 }
00040 ?>
